content: An anagram of "salter", these are devices that give warning of possible danger or difficulty.

A "salter" is an anagram of "alerts." Alerts are devices or signals that warn of possible danger or difficulty. They can be auditory, visual, or both, and are designed to capture attention and communicate urgent information quickly. For example, fire alarms, smoke detectors, and emergency sirens are all types of alert systems used to warn people of immediate danger.
